summary: This bill, the "Banning In Government Oil Industry Lobbyists from the Cabinet Act," prohibits the appointment of former fossil fuel executives and lobbyists to key government positions, including department heads and political appointees within various federal agencies. It defines "covered department head," "covered political appointee," "executive officer," "fossil fuel," "fossil fuel entity," and "fossil fuel lobbyist" to clarify the scope of the bill. The central aim is to limit the influence of the fossil fuel industry on government decision-making by preventing individuals with recent ties to the industry from holding sensitive positions.
